Parameters¶

A basic parameters module for optimization routines.

class optimparameters.parameters.Parameter(name, value, minv=- inf, maxv=inf, vary=True, mcmcscale=0.5, commonality=None)¶

A class for a model parameter.

name¶

The name of the parameter.

Type

str

value¶

The current value of the parameter.

Type

str

minv¶

The min bound.

Type

str

maxv¶

The max bound.

Type

str

vary¶

Whether or not to vary this parameter.

Type

str

mcmcscale¶

The mcmc scale step of the parameter.

Type

str

commonality¶

What this parameter is common to. Can be anything the user decides to implement.

Type

str

Creates a Parameter object.

Parameters

  • name (str) – The name of the parameter.

  • value (str) – The value of the parameter.

  • minv (str) – The min bound.

  • maxv (str) – The max bound.

  • vary (str) – Whether or not to vary this parameter.

  • mcmcscale (str) – The mcmc scale step of the parameter.

  • commonality (str) – What this parameter is common to. Can be anything the user decides to implement.

setv(**kwargs)¶

Setter method for the attributes.

kwargs:

Any available atrribute (str).

class optimparameters.parameters.Parameters¶

A container for a set of model parameters which extends the Python 3 dictionary, which is ordered by default.

add_parameter(parameter)¶

Adds a parameter to the Parameters dictionary.

Parameters

parameter (Parameter) – The parameter to add.

classmethod from_numpy(names, values, minvs=None, maxvs=None, varies=None, mcmcscales=None, commonalities=None)¶

Create a parameters object from numpy arrays

kwargs:

Iterables of parameter attributes.

classmethod oflength(n)¶

Returns a parameters object of some length with dummy names.

Parameters

n (int) – The number of parameters to add.

Returns

A list containing parameter names (strings) which are out of bounds.

Return type

bad_pars (list)

pretty_print()¶

Prints all parameters and attributes in a readable fashion.

sanity_check()¶

Checks for parameters which vary and are out of bounds. :returns: A list containing parameter names (strings) which are out of bounds. :rtype: bad_pars (list)

sanity_lock()¶

Locks any parameters such that the min value is equal to the max value.

setv(**kwargs)¶

Setter method for an attribute(s) for all parameters, in order of insertion.

kwargs:

Any available Parameter atrribute.

unpack(keys=None)¶

Unpacks values to numpy arrays.

Parameters

keys (tuple) – A tuple of strings containing the keys to unpack, defaults to None for all keys.

Returns

A dictionary containing the returned values.

Return type

vals (dict)
